refnamediv.refpurpose: Set string variable to value from strset table or string p-field

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: strget sets a string variable at initialization time to the value stored in strset table at the specified index, or a string p-field from the score. If there is no string defined for the index, the variable is set to an empty string.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: indx -- strset index, or score p-field
